law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Estate" means property that is subject to administration under the Estates and Trusts Article as the estate of a decedent.

section.section: "Less than absolute interest" means an interest less than an absolute interest in property, in trust or otherwise.
Notwithstanding any parol agreement, the written form of the title is controlling for intangible personal property held in joint tenancy.

"Subsequent interest" means a vested or contingent remainder, executory or reversionary interest, or other future interest that is created by a decedent and will or may vest in possession after the death of the decedent.
"Subsequent interest" includes a sole or concurrent subsequent interest.
